p: We evaluated different tests to identify the anatomical features and histolocalization of the essential oil from N. megapotamica with different chemotypes. The histochemical analyses of sample S6 (chemotype A) are presented in Fig 2(A) and 2(B), and chemotype B samples are presented in Fig 2(C) and 2(D) (sample C1) and Fig 2(E) and 2(F) (sample C3). Anatomical differences were not observed between samples from the two chemotypes (specimens from region S (S6) and region C (C1 and C3)).
